SELECT * FROM ( SELECT protask.*, ROWNUM rnum from ( SELECT proposed_task_id as propTaskId, proposed_task_name as propTaskName, proposed_task_desc as propTaskDesc, TO_CHAR(est_start_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as estStartDateInString, TO_CHAR(est_end_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as estEndDateInString, proposed_by as propBy, proposed_by_name as propByName, proposed_to as propTo, proposed_to_name as propToName, created_by as createdBy, updated_by as updatedBy, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate, task_id as taskId, proposal_status as propStatus, proposal_status_name as propStatusName, est_main_days as estMainDays FROM VPROPOSED_TASK WHERE proposed_by = #empId# and proposal_status != 'TA_STAT_99'
LOWER(proposed_task_name) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
LOWER(proposed_to_name) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
LOWER(proposal_status_name) LIKE LOWER( '%' || #searchValue# || '%' )
order by proposed_task_id ) protask where ROWNUM < = #end#) WHERE rnum > #begin#

insert into PROPOSED_TASK ( proposed_task_id, proposed_task_name, proposed_task_desc, est_start_date, est_end_date, proposed_by, proposed_to, created_by, create_date, proposal_status, est_main_days)
values ( #propTaskId#, #propTaskName#, #propTaskDesc#, to_date(#estStartDateInString#,'yyyy-MM-dd'), to_date(#estEndDateInString#,'yyyy-MM-dd'), #propBy#, (select supervisor_id from employee where employee_id = #propBy# ), #createdBy#, SYSDATE, 'TA_STAT_01', fGetEstimatedMainDays(TO_DATE(#estStartDateInString#,'yyyy-MM-dd'),TO_DATE(#estEndDateInString#,'yyyy-MM-dd')))
